title: COAST / SMALL BUOY
description: Here you can find Klaasje's buoy if you know about it.

dialogueTree.title: Small Buoy: "The dome-shaped plastic buoy still..."
dialogueTree.text: The dome-shaped plastic buoy still bobs up and down in the water amidst the trembling reeds.

links.title: You: ""Damn, I felt *really* strange just..."
links.text: "Damn, I felt *really* strange just now."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm." No further response. All his..."
links.text: "Mhm." No further response. All his concentration is on the contraption.

links.title: You: ""We're lucky it's still here. A lit..."
links.text: "We're lucky it's still here. A little longer and it would have floated away..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant flashes a mirthless..."
links.text: The lieutenant flashes a mirthless half-smile. "We still got here too late. There's nothing of use here anymore."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Indeed." The lieutenant nods thoug..."
links.text: "Indeed." The lieutenant nods thoughtfully. "Let's see what's inside."

links.title: You: "Pick up the buoy."
links.text: Pick up the buoy.

links.title: Small Buoy: "You lift the buoy out of the water..."
links.text: You lift the buoy out of the water without much effort. It's not tied to anything -- the cords dangling from the bottom appear to have been cut.

links.title: You: "Examine the plastic ball."
links.text: Examine the plastic ball.

links.title: Small Buoy: "The number '11' has been written on..."
links.text: The number '11' has been written on the yellow plastic. It hasn't been in the water for very long, but it's already discoloured and slimy with silt. A latch holds it closed, but only just barely -- the brittle metal of the latch has cracked.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Simple construction, very unsafe.""
links.text: "Simple construction, very unsafe."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Primitive construction, but it does..."
links.text: Primitive construction, but it does the job.

links.title: You: "Shake the buoy."
links.text: Shake the buoy.

links.title: Small Buoy: "There's something in there... splas..."
links.text: There's something in there... splashing around.

links.title: You: "Sniff the buoy."
links.text: Sniff the buoy.

links.title: Small Buoy: "It smells like you would expect it..."
links.text: It smells like you would expect it to smell: a concentrated version of the coast. Salt, industrial slop and decay.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "...and just a dash of hard liquor...."
links.text: ...and just a dash of hard liquor. Yummm.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "The water this side of the peninsul..."
links.text: The water this side of the peninsula is cleaner, actually. Smells a little salty.

links.title: You: "Open the buoy. (Move on.)"
links.text: Open the buoy. (Move on.)

links.title: Small Buoy: "A shot-glass's worth of seawater po..."
links.text: A shot-glass's worth of seawater pours out -- some algae. And nothing else.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well, damn.""
links.text: "Well, damn."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Another identity misplaced... There..."
links.text: Another identity misplaced... There must be some cosmic conspiracy afoot!

links.title: You: "Stare into the empty buoy."
links.text: Stare into the empty buoy.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I have no idea." The lieutenant ta..."
links.text: "I have no idea." The lieutenant taps his foot, frowning.

links.title: You: ""This is a minor quirk. We know wha..."
links.text: "This is a minor quirk. We know what was in the buoy anyway."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He purses his lips. "Or *think* we..."
links.text: He purses his lips. "Or *think* we do... This is a small loose end, either way. Not important I hope."

links.title: You: ""It must have been Klaasje's enemie..."
links.text: "It must have been Klaasje's enemies -- which means she's in danger!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Could be. We should keep an eye ou..."
links.text: "Could be. We should keep an eye out." He sighs. "Nothing more for us to do here. Let's go."

links.title: You: ""Maybe Klaasje took them herself...""
links.text: "Maybe Klaasje took them herself..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That may very well be the case. We..."
links.text: "That may very well be the case. We should keep an eye on her." He sighs. "Nothing more for us to do here. Let's go."

links.title: You: ""I think there's a cosmic conspirac..."
links.text: "I think there's a cosmic conspiracy -- identities being lost and stolen left and right..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This wasn't a *real* identity, at..."
links.text: "This wasn't a *real* identity, at least not as far as we know." He sighs. "We should go."

links.title: You: ""Could this be related to the crypt..."
links.text: "Could this be related to the cryptozoologists and their little expedition?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In my experience, cryptids are gen..."
links.text: "In my experience, cryptids are generally uninterested in travel documentation." He sighs. "We should go."

links.title: You: ""I've no idea. Do you have any theo..."
links.text: "I've no idea. Do you have any theories, lieutenant?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Might have been Klaasje. Might hav..."
links.text: "Might have been Klaasje. Might have been the people after her. Might have been a local drunk." He shrugs. "We should go."

links.title: You: ""This is a disaster. Everything is..."
links.text: "This is a disaster. Everything is ruined."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I wouldn't go so far as to say tha..."
links.text: "I wouldn't go so far as to say that. This is only a small loose end. But I do wish we knew who took the documents."

links.title: Small Buoy: "The buoy continues to be mostly emp..."
links.text: The buoy continues to be mostly empty.

links.title: You: "It must have been Klaasje's enemies..."
links.text: It must have been Klaasje's enemies -- which means she's in danger!

links.title: Small Buoy: "No answers appear to you in the dir..."
links.text: No answers appear to you in the dirty sea water at the bottom of the buoy. Just the heavy smell of brine and silt and disappearance.

links.title: Logic: "You could ask the Miss what she thi..."
links.text: You could ask the Miss what she thinks. Later, if you have the time -- though you doubt she'll tell you much at this point.

links.title: You: "Maybe Klaasje took them herself..."
links.text: Maybe Klaasje took them herself...

links.title: You: "There's a cosmic conspiracy -- iden..."
links.text: There's a cosmic conspiracy -- identities being lost and stolen left and right...

links.title: You: "I think... it may have been the Ins..."
links.text: I think... it may have been the Insulindian phasmid.

links.title: You: "Don't try to guess who took the doc..."
links.text: Don't try to guess who took the documents. You don't have enough information.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Coward. You should *always* try to..."
links.text: Coward. You should *always* try to guess.

links.title: You: "Let the buoy be. [Leave.]"
links.text: Let the buoy be. [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Small Buoy: "A metal-and-plastic contraption bob..."
dialogueTree.text: A metal-and-plastic contraption bobs up and down amidst the trembling reeds. At first it just looks like trash, but if you look closer...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That over there," he points to the..."
links.text: "That over there," he points to the strange-looking object, "must be the buoy Klaasje told us about -- the one she hid her passport in. We should take a look."

links.title: Drama: "Oooh, hidden things -- secrets, lie..."
links.text: Oooh, hidden things -- secrets, lies!

links.title: Shivers: "Cold. Air. Tendons. Snapped the cor..."
links.text: Cold. Air. Tendons. Snapped the cords keeping the buoy in place. A little longer and it would be floating somewhere out in the open sea...

links.title: You: "What?"
links.text: What?

links.title: Shivers: "Moves across the water, leaving no..."
links.text: Moves across the water, leaving no traces. You're cold again, as always...

links.title: You: "Yes, but who or what is this?"
links.text: Yes, but who or what is this?

links.title: Shivers: "Splendour."
links.text: Splendour.

links.title: You: "Enough. Shake it off."
links.text: Enough. Shake it off.

links.title: Shivers: "It's just rapid movement across the..."
links.text: It's just rapid movement across the water. It leaves no trace. A whisper...

links.title: Shivers: "Yes, spindly extremities have been..."
links.text: Yes, spindly extremities have been here, snapped the cords keeping the buoy in place. A little longer -- and it will be floating somewhere out in the open sea...

links.title: Logic: "This must be the buoy Klaasje menti..."
links.text: This must be the buoy Klaasje mentioned.
